description: * Search 10,000+ background wallpapers. The most popular image app on iPhone, Android and Blackberry - downloaded more than 10 million times - now for your Pre and Pixi. * New backgrounds added daily - check back often. * Unique Backgrounds created by our design team * add your photos and create your very own wallpapers! Feedback email: apps @ stylem.com * Choose from over 50 categories such as: Funny, Cars, Guys, Movies, Space, Cute, Girly, Sports, Games, Beaches, Water, Messages / Quotes, Night, Hearts, Swirls, Explosions, Buildings, Cities, Fantasy, Sunsets, Technology, Flowers, People & Celebrities, Music, Space, Valentine's Day, Christmas, New Years, Animals and many more. Notes: - images are either created by us or are from wikipedia/media (public domain / GNU) or licensed under creative commons (see attribution).
